snippet: Much progress has been made in the campaign to reduce mortality by 2015, but many gaps still remain.
abstract: Editorial warns that without more intense efforts and money the world will not meet the United Nations' Millennium Development goals to reduce mortality by 2015; observes that while much progress has been made, there are significant gaps, such as providing antiviral therapy to all people infected with HIV and in distributing low-cost remedies for common causes of death like malaria.
lead_paragraph: Much progress has been made in the campaign to reduce mortality by 2015, but many gaps still remain.

headline.main: The Race to Improve Global Health
headline.print_headline: The Race to Improve Global Health
